review:
it's a masterpiece.. just epic!
one of the best comedy flims of the decade & the century.
everyone nailed their role with perfection.
but akshay kumar's comedy, comic timing is beyond phenomenal.
a cinematic masterpiece in comedy genre.  really a great one by the master of comedy , priyadarshan . refreshing songs are bonus!! a must watch
don't go in film rating it's one of best comedy films ever imdb should be at least 7.8/10 master piece movie after hera pheri just one word awesome. and watch it's non stop comedy
i still laugh while watching this movie. it is a masterpiece in comedy genre. songs are must listen especially 'chori chori' and 'kiss me baby'.
timeless piece of bollywood comedy cinema...no other has or can arrive to the heights of comic timing as this movie.... you're life's not worth living if you haven't watched this movie yet...
one of the best comedy movie ever! gem of a movie ❤️ you won't be bored even if you watch it more than 10 times.
